summary: The implementation covers most requirements but is missing the 'interests' field from REQ-1 in the ProfileCard display and includes language-related features (nativeLanguages, targetLanguages) that were not requested in the BuildRequest.

missing_requirements.requirement: Users can create a profile with interests field visible in profile displays
missing_requirements.reason: While the interests field exists in the UserProfile type and can be edited in ProfileEditor, it is not displayed in the ProfileCard component used for browsing (frontend/src/components/ProfileCard.tsx). Only nativeLanguages and targetLanguages are shown, but interests are omitted from the browse view.

hallucinated_features.description: Native Languages and Target Languages profile fields
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest specified profiles should include 'name, age, bio, and interests' only. The implementation adds nativeLanguages and targetLanguages fields throughout the system (UserProfile type, ProfileSetup, ProfileEditor, ProfileCard) which were not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: User status and activity tracking system
hallucinated_features.reason: The implementation includes currentStatus, lastActive, and lastMessageCheck fields in UserProfile, plus an activeProfiles map and getCurrentActiveParticipants functionality. These activity tracking features were not requested in the requirements.
